patthana16.80:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.80:1.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.80:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
